title: By the King, a proclamation for regulating the colours to be worn on merchants ships
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall the eighteenth day of September, 1674, in the six and twentieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
